goal.en: The objectives of this course are to lead students to write logical and clearly structured essays, and appropriately incorporate western "finding" writing techniques. I will lead students to write project proposals, book reviews, autobiographies, resumes, and interviews. Through peer reviews and feedback from teachers, we will understand that "knowing the reader" is the first lesson of writing, and we will not only practice various types of writing, but also try to strengthen students' motivation to read through writing practice, effectively enhance students' independent learning motivation, and stimulate their ability to think later, so that they can reflect on today's copywriting and online platform story writing strategies.
goal.ch: 本課程的目標是帶領同學寫作具邏輯和清晰結構的文章，並適度融入西方「查找」的寫作技巧，嘗試規劃有系統的寫作課程，帶領同學撰寫企劃書、書評、自傳及履歷、採訪文稿，透過同儕互評與業師回饋，理解「認識讀者」乃寫作的第一課，不僅練習各類型的寫作，本課程也試圖透過寫作實踐，強化同學的閱讀動機，有效提升同學自主學習動機，激發同學後設思考能力，以此反思當今的文案寫作、網路故事的寫作策略。
